page.description: The .CENTER_JUSTIFY() method center justifies text in an RTF memo object. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example center justifies text in an RTF field in an open form.
section.example: dim obj as P obj = :Customer_Information:rtfmemofield.this obj.rtf.insert_text("This is RTF text") obj.rtf.center_justify()
